title: 使用开服侠，链接一段时间后会断开链接
txt_content:
运行代码：
[22:13:53] [Server thread/INFO]: LiX joined the game
[22:13:53] [Server thread/INFO]: You whisper to LiX: - ?????, LiX!
[22:13:59] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown command
[22:13:59] [Server thread/INFO]: <--[HERE]
[22:14:08] [Server thread/INFO]: LiX lost connection: Timed out
[控制台] 玩家退出: LiX
[22:14:08] [Server thread/INFO]: LiX left the game
[22:14:10] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown command
[22:14:10] [Server thread/INFO]: <--[HERE]
[22:14:20] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown command
[22:14:20] [Server thread/INFO]: <--[HERE]
[22:14:30] [Server thread/INFO]: Unknown command

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-6-27 22:21 编辑 

为啥要用开服侠呢  sakurafrp放在那你不用

到目前为止我这没有出现过一次因为sakurafrp经常掉线的情况

replies.author: aassdsd
replies.txt_content: emm,大把开服器不用，用这东西干嘛

replies.author: ttc_V
replies.txt_content: 可能就是和服务器链接不稳定导致的吧？可以使用网易UU这种加速器加速启动的javaw.exe文件试试

skyliye 发表于 2019-6-27 22:19
为啥要用开服侠呢  sakurafrp放在那你不用

到目前为止我这没有出现过一次因为sakurafrp经常掉线的情况
我不知道怎么用其他的东西去开服，开服侠比较方便而且外网能连接
